name: api
description: hasura metadata export hasura metadata apply

scripts.bootstrap: hasura update-cli && yarn hasura:start && wait-on http-get://hasura:8080/healthz && yarn hasura:setup && yarn hasura:seed && yarn codegen:api && yarn compose:dev stop
scripts.bootstrap:ci: hasura update-cli && yarn hasura:start:ci && wait-on http-get://localhost:8080/healthz && yarn hasura:setup:ci && yarn codegen:api:ci && yarn compose:ci stop
scripts.test: echo "no test runner configured for package api" && exit 0
scripts.lint: echo "no linter configured for package api"
scripts.lint:ci: echo "no linter configured for package api"
scripts.reset: yarn compose:dev down && (docker volume inspect api_postgres_data >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker volume rm api_postgres_data || true) && rm -rf __generated/* && rm -rf metadata/query_collections.yaml
scripts.dev: yarn hasura:start && wait-on http-get://hasura:8080/healthz && yarn hasura:console
scripts.hasura:metadata:apply: yarn hasura:start && wait-on http-get://hasura:8080/healthz && hasura metadata apply --endpoint http://hasura:8080 && hasura metadata reload --endpoint http://hasura:8080
scripts.hasura:console: yarn hasura:console:open & yarn hasura:autogen & dotenvx run -f .env -- hasura console --endpoint http://hasura:8080 --no-browser --address localhost --console-hge-endpoint http://localhost:8080; kill %%
